snippet: GREENBERG--Selma, passed away on February 7, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Emanuel. Devoted mother of Gary and Jonathan and mother-in-law of JoAnne Chernow. Services today 11:30am at "The Riverside," 76th Street and Amsterdam Avenue. 1/3
lead_paragraph: GREENBERG--Selma, passed away on February 7, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Emanuel. Devoted mother of Gary and Jonathan and mother-in-law of JoAnne Chernow. Services today 11:30am at "The Riverside," 76th Street and Amsterdam Avenue. 1/3
